item.title: Honor Among Thieves
item.description:
INTRODUCTION

This challenge is a continuation of the previous one, Distract and Destroy. Our main character, Alex, now has two others in her party. Their objective is to somehow gain the key to the treasure (the flag) by eavesdropping on a rival party.

Since a lot of the setup was done in the first challenge of the series, I won’t be covering it again. Please see the Setup section of that walkthrough for more detail.

item.title: Survival of the Fittest
item.description:
INTRODUCTION

Starting up the challenge, it looks like a cute little web-based side scrolling RPG. The interface is limited to just Attack and Restart. Despite it’s simple appearance, this challenge is actually hosting a private blockchain, where the game is running as a distributed app. The goal is simple: kill the monsters.

This was my first blockchain challenge. Even though the challenge itself was very very easy, I was quite confused about how to set up the hardhat environment. I’m writing this walkthrough in the hopes that others won’t have to stumble over the same issues that I did.
